title: Hatching Eggs
description: Do you know how chicks hatch from eggs? After reading Hatching Eggs, students will be able to answer this question as they follow a class through the steps of helping chicks hatch. The book uses colorful illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive sentence patterns to support emergent readers. The book can be used to teach students about sequencing events and using commas after introductory words.
reviewWords: chicks, cracks, eggs, hatch, incubator, mark
comprehension: Sequence Events                : Determine the sequence of events
grammar: Commas                : Recognize and use commas after introductory words
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
